document.full_text: johnny depp as captain jack sparrow is back in excellent form for his fourth adventure in "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides," which is more serious in the hands of a new director, rob marshall, and thanks to penelope cruz it's also a good deal sexier.
document.title: penelope cruz adds spice to enjoyable "pirates 4"
lines_and_colors: johnny depp as captain jack sparrow is back in excellent form for his fourth adventure in "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides," which is more serious in the hands of a new director, rob marshall, and thanks to penelope cruz it's also a good deal sexier.
